datafield.subfield: NUCMC data from New Jersey His. Soc. for Banking and insurance collection, 1804-1956

(National Newark Banking Company; established 1804 as Newark Banking and Insurance Company; became Newark Banking Company in 1859; National Newark Banking Company in 1865; and National Newark and Essex Banking Company in 1917)

p. 249 (National Newark Banking Company; founded as Newark Banking & Insurance Company; became Newark Banking Company in 1859, National Newark Banking Company, 1865; absorbed Essex County Bank in 1917 and became National Newark & Essex Banking Company)
(hdg.: National Newark & Essex Banking Company, Newark, N.J.; result of merger of National Newark Banking Company, Newark City National Bank, and Essex County National Bank)
